
// AUTO-GENERATED by camel-package-maven-plugin - DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE
= camel log

Tail logs from running Camel integrations


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel log [options]
----



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--find` | Find and highlight matching text (ignore case). |  | String
| `--follow` | Keep following and outputting new log lines (press enter to exit). | true | boolean
| `--grep` | Filter logs to only output lines matching text (ignore case). |  | String
| `--logging-color` | Use colored logging | true | boolean
| `--prefix` | Print prefix with running Camel integration name. auto=only prefix when running multiple integrations. true=always prefix. false=prefix off. | auto | String
| `--since` | Return logs newer than a relative duration like 5s, 2m, or 1h. The value is in seconds if no unit specified. |  | String
| `--startup` | Only shows logs from the starting phase to make it quick to look at how Camel was started. | false | boolean
| `--tail` | The number of lines from the end of the logs to show. Use -1 to read from the beginning. Use 0 to read only new lines. Defaults to showing all logs from beginning. | -1 | int
| `--timestamp` | Print timestamp. | true | boolean
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
